resources.string: Restaurant Health Inspector
Contaminated Food
Food not process properly
Food not cooled properly
Cold food not stored properly
Food not protected properly
Food not thawed properly
Frozen food not stored properly
Not clean equipment
Equipment not washed properly
Hot and Cold water
Not Free of Pests
Pests can enter and breed
Unsafe Food Environment
Not suitable Equipment
Unsafe Equipment
Chemicals cleaners not stored properly
Not following plans
Lacking accurate thermometers
Nowhere to hand wash
Not proper hand wash
Employee lacks hygiene
No FOODSAFE Level 1
Lacks FOODSAFE LEVEL 1 if operator is absence
Not Critical, Plans/construction/alterations not in accordance with the Regulation [s. 3; s. 4]
Not Critical, Operation of an unapproved food premises [s. 6(1)]
Not Critical, Failure to hold a valid permit while operating a food service establishment [s. 8(1)]
Not Critical, Permit not posted in a conspicuous location [s. 8(7)]
Critical, Food contaminated or unfit for human consumption [s. 13]
Critical, Food not processed in a manner that makes it safe to eat [s. 14(1)]
Critical, Food not cooled in an acceptable manner [s. 12(a)]
Critical, Food not cooked or reheated in a manner that makes it safe to eat [s. 14(1)]
Critical, Cold potentially hazardous food stored/displayed above 4 °C. [s. 14(2)]
Critical, Hot potentially hazardous food stored/displayed below 60 °C. [s. 14(2)]
Not Critical, Foods obtained from unapproved sources [s. 11]
Not Critical, Food not protected from contamination [s. 12(a)]
Not Critical, Food not thawed in an acceptable manner [s. 14(2)]
Not Critical, Frozen potentially hazardous food stored/displayed above -18 °C. [s. 14(3)]
Not Critical, Operator has not provided acceptable written food handling procedures [s. 23]
Critical, Equipment/utensils/food contact surfaces not maintained in sanitary condition [s. 17(1)]
Critical, Equipment/utensils/food contact surfaces not properly washed and sanitized [s. 17(2)]
Critical, Equipment/facilities/hot and cold water for sanitary maintenance not adequate [s. 17(3); s. 4(1)(f)]
Not Critical, Premises not free of pests [s. 26(a)]
Not Critical, Conditions observed that may allow entrance/harbouring/breeding of pests [s. 26(b,c)]
Not Critical, Food premises not maintained in a sanitary condition [s. 17(1)]
Not Critical, Equipment/utensils/food contact surfaces are not of suitable design/material [s. 16; s. 19]
Not Critical, Equipment/utensils/food contact surfaces are not in good working order [s. 16(b)]
Not Critical, Chemicals cleansers and similar agents stored or labeled improperly [s. 27]
Not Critical, Single use containers and utensils are used more than once [s. 20]
Not Critical, Premises not maintained as per approved plans [s. 6(1)(b)]
Not Critical, Items not required for food premises operation being stored on the premises [s. 18]
Not Critical, Live animal on the premises excluding guide animal in approved areas [s. 25(1)]
Not Critical, Operator has not provided acceptable written sanitation procedures [s. 24]
Not Critical, Refrigeration units and hot holding equipment lack accurate thermometers [s. 19(2)]
Critical, Adequate hand washing stations not available for employees [s. 21(4)]
Critical, Employee does not wash hands properly or at adequate frequency [s. 21(3)]
Not Critical, Employee lacks good personal hygiene clean clothing and hair control [s. 21(1)]
Not Critical, Employee smoking in food preparation/processing/storage areas [s. 21(2)]
Not Critical, Operator does not have FOODSAFE Level 1 or Equivalent [s. 10(1)]
Not Critical, In operator’s absence no staff on duty has FOODSAFE Level 1 or equivalent [s. 10(2)]
